concept.title: AFMC PGI 5309.303-90 Use

li.p: (a) Specific instructions for first article testing and approval can be found in AFMCI 23-110 , POST-AWARD PART VERIFICATION AND APPROVAL, paragraph 2.2, entitled Contracting Responsibilities.

(b) First Article Testing and/or the use of FAR 52.209-4, First Article Approval â€“ Government Testing, are used to provide the Government estimate of the cost of retesting disapproved first articles.
